admreg: Europe and Central Asia,Europe and Central Asia

abstracts.cdata!:
The overall objectives of the Treasury
            Development Project for the Russian Federation are to 1)
            ensure conditions for effective implmentation of the budget,
            and enable the finance ministry to maintain budget
            oversight; and 2) provide a transparent system of accounting
            that shows the utilization of the financial resoures of the
            Government and enables management and audit of these
            resources. There are four project components. The first
            component supplements the consulting/advisory services
            concerning budget execution supported by the International
            monetary Fund with technical assistance in these functional
            and technical areas: budget classifications and coding
            structures, and development and design of a revised
            structure and chart of accounts; development of the legal,
            regulatory, and operational framework and detailed
            guidelines, procedures, regulations, forms, and operating
            manuals; developing methods to improve forescasting of
            expenditure requirements and cash management; developing
            technology architecture; researching and identifying
            aplication software; and supervising implementation of the
            budget execution. The second component finances equipment
            and software. The third component supports the training
            requirements. The fourth and final component assists the
            Treasury with administering and managing the project and
            includes funding to over incremental operating expenses.
